oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Eddie Hill Show (Tape 3)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording features a conversation between radio host, Eddie Hill and Hank Snow. Ray Price is heard at the beginning of the recording. Red Foley calls in and talks to Snow while Hill continues to broadcast. The conversation is primary about the turntables breaking and what to do in the mean time. Hill does announce songs that were played in real time but are not included on this recording. The tape is dated April of 1957. This tape is the third for the Eddie Hill Show and conversation has been carried over from the second tape. This tape is forty-eight of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Hill; Hank Snow; Red Foley; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Unidentified guitar tune (Unidentified) [incomplete] -- (00:21) Rewinding noise -- (00:29) Unidentified guitar tune (Unidentified) [incomplete] -- (01:05) Rewinding noise -- (01:11) Unidentified guitar tune (Unidentified) [incomplete] -- (01:31) Rewinding noise -- (01:43) Unidentified guitar tune (Unidentified) [incomplete] -- (02:09) Random guitar strumming -- (02:38) Unidentified guitar tune (Unidentified) -- (04:09) Eddie Hill and Hank Snow come on in the middle of conversation [conversation continues from tape 2]-- (04:28) Hill announces the next song, "I'll Be There" -- (04:53) Hill and Snow talk about a caller and Rod Foley -- (05:42) Hill talks to Ray Price about upcoming travels -- (06:19) Price thanks Hill and Snow -- (06:45) Hill thanks Price and his bandmates [Hank talking in the background] -- (07:43) Hill announces the next song, "That Crazy Mambo Thing" -- (07:57) Hill states that the turntables went out and Hill and Snow try to fix it [Hank talking in the background] -- (10:05) Hill updates the listeners on what is going on in the station [Hank talking in the background with Red Foley on the phone] -- (10:43) Hill announces upcoming shows [conversation and tape cut out] [conversation continues on tape 4]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1995; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Price, Ray, 1926-2013;
